fields.label: Flexible Content Sections
fields.name: page_flexible_content
fields.instructions: You can create, manage, reorder, and edit Flexible Content sections here. To see examples of flexible content sections, check out http://theavenueconcept.org/sample

sub_fields.label: Section ID for Navigation
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: To include this section in a page sub-navigation menu, enter an all lowercase section ID here, using only letters or numbers, no special characters or spaces. Use this ID in the programs pages sub-navigation menu settings. Use dashes instead of spaces, if necessary. For example 'call-for-artists' or '2d'.

choices.font-main: Untitled Sans (for body text and general use)
Untitled Sans (for body text and general use)

sub_fields.label: Vimeo ID
sub_fields.name: vimeo_id
sub_fields.instructions: Include the Vimeo ID Here. The ID is at the end of the URL of a vimeo video. For example, the ID of a video with URL https://vimeo.com/3528611 would be 3528611

sub_fields.label: Youtube ID
sub_fields.name: youtube_id
sub_fields.instructions: Include the Youtube ID Here. The ID is at the end of the URL of a youtube video. For example, the ID of a video with URL https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mn3Egf59F8c would be mn3Egf59F8c
